title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Systems Engineering Approach to Safety, Causes of Accidents, Accident Analysis and Control, Techniques used in Safety analysis, Safety Management and Organization, Risk Management, Training, Human Behavioral Approach in Safety, Human Factors aspects in mine Safety.
